team.name: Jessica Anderson
team.message: Jessica was accepted into UTM as an Accounting Student, but ended up wanting to do Computer Science, so she is ready to tackle any of your POSt questions. She always struggles to choose which courses are most important to take and she's ready to share her findings!

team.name: Nameera Azim
team.message: Nameera is a third-year student specializing in Computer Science and minoring in both Statistics and Business. On lazy days, you can probably find her reading, painting, fangirling over an MCU movie, watching the Premier League, or messing around with her ukulele! Feel free to reach out!

team.name: Naaz Sibia
team.message: Naaz likes preference learning and Human-Computer Interaction (with a CS-ed focus). She also likes talking about mental health, and courses she's TA'ed. When not looking into the mentioned topics, or working to finish her bachelor's degree, she likes having 3 am discussions with friends, drawing chibis, and eating Chinese food.

team.name: Jarrod Servilla
team.message: As the tech director, Jarrod creates initiatives to equip students with technical skills to help them find internships or make cool projects! He's an avid Kanye stan & plays lots of strategy games. Some accomplishments: Hit Diamond for every set in Teamfight Tactics, Top 4'd a Magic: The Gathering Standard PPTQ

team.name: Michael Liut
team.message: Michael is a Computer Science educator who prides himself in fostering an environment of educational excellence through active and experiential learning. In recent years he has assisted in the development and implementation of active learning materials/strategies in several Computer Science courses at UTM. Michael enjoys travelling, and is an avid scuba diver.
